name: Craft Gin Club
slogan: Craft Gin Club is the world's largest subscription service for gin lovers
description:
Ever since that hot summer evening on Dragon’s Den, we’ve been hard at work, scouting the UK - and the globe! - to find the world's finest small-batch gins.

Every month, we select one very special bottle of gin, including rare and exclusive editions not available elsewhere, and send it to our members in a treat-filled Gin of the Month box. 

Craft Gin Club was named People’s Champion in the 2018 Startups Awards and included in the Sunday Times Fast Track 'Ones to Watch' 2018 list.

team.name: Alex Petrogiannis
team.bioHtml: Marketing expert with 12+ years experience across tech, online retail, automotive, marketplaces and start-ups.

jobs.title: Web Designer/ Front-End Developer
jobs.description:
We’re Craft Gin Club - a TOP 10 UK startup and the biggest drinks subscription in the country.

Ever since our founders pitched successfully on Dragons’ Den, we’ve been hard at work, scouting the country - and the globe! - to find the world's finest small-batch gins. Every month, we send thousands of gin lovers across the country a surprise box packed with craft gins, mixers, foodie treats and our club mag.

As our web & digital designer, you will own our online presence including our e-commerce front-end and digital advertising.
As a key member of our integrated design team, you will lead on all digital requirements from concept through to execution.

You will help us optimise the user journeys on our website, migrate to a new e-commerce platform, rethink our blog - one of the best-read food & drink blogs in the country and take our digital marketing communications to the next level.
Not afraid to get your hands dirty, you will also understand front-end development to help deliver web changes & improvements in real time.

Key Accountabilities
 
Ownership of the craftginclub.co.uk web experience - from regular creative updates to UX and optimisation roadmap
Creation of digital advertising assets as part of our integrated marketing campaigns.
Creation of digital, social and web assets in support of our weekly comms plan
UX/UI design for craftginclub.co.uk, the GINNED! blog and our members login area
Optimisation of key user journeys and development of new ones.
Front-end development where necessary.
 
Experience & Skills
 
Excellent all-round design skills across digital media.
Strong experience designing websites.
Strong experience with Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign and Acrobat. 
Good understanding of UX, SEO and website optimisation.
Good knowledge of HTML, Javascript and  CSS.
High energy personality that likes to get stuck in.
Knowledge and working experience of Agile methodologies is a plus.
Excellent organisational and project management skills.
